column1: dictonary of model params (e.g. model trace: set v to t or nil)
dictonary of default values set for the set-default-values-in-imaginal production rule
include chunk types (goal, display-info, sound-info, image-info, button-info, list-info)
include entities in environment as chunks (e.g. displays, sounds, images, buttons)
instantiate the chunk types wrt existing entities in environment (as declarative memory)
include goal driven recognition (attending, scanning and updating) wrt following items in routine loop (only applies in gdr mode)
default goal and slots (e.g. state start)
use case specific model components file (in task directory)
filnename and path of style of routine loop operation, (visual) goal-driven visual information processiong (setting 'n' will exclude this component from the model)
filnename and path of style of routine loop operation, (visual) data-driven visual information processing (setting 'n' will exclude this component from the model)
filename and relative path of goal
default values in model (%name in model components additional and routine loop operation will be replaced by respective value of name)
